responses.rationale: Factual report of a past event and its impact without explicit framing cues.
Factual description of infection mechanism without explicit framing cues.
Factual description of infection mechanism using neutral language ('can happen').
Factual description of cross infection mechanism without explicit framing cues.
Factual description of illness range without explicit framing cues.
Factual report of a rare case; 'rare' is descriptive, not an intensifier of harm.
'concerning' is a psychological term, neutral per context guard unless amplified.
Factual report of a confirmation without explicit framing cues.
Reports a quote discussing humaneness of culling, not framing the threat itself.
Factual report of a confirmation without explicit framing cues.
Factual report of historical events; 'large outbreaks' is descriptive scale.
'reigniting fears' is a psychological verb, neutral per context guard unless amplified.
Factual report of a characteristic; 'high mortality rates' is a technical description.
Factual report of ongoing procedure and potential case ('potential' is neutral modal).
Factual report of a positive test result without explicit framing cues.
Factual report of a detection; 'highly pathogenic' is a technical term.
Factual report of a sequence of events without explicit framing cues.
Factual report of findings listing locations and types of flocks.
Factual report of belief about spread and test results; 'spreading' is neutral.
Factual report of expert opinion on scope ('primarily an animal health issue').
A neutral question about potential impact.
Factual report of detection scale ('more than a dozen states' is neutral metric).
A neutral question about comparison.
'raised concerns' is a psychological verb, neutral per context guard unless amplified.
Factual report of consequences and state condition; 'particularly hard hit' describes background condition.
Factual list of symptoms; 'sudden increase in mortality' is descriptive.
Factual report about virus history and infections ('infected hundreds' is statistic).
Factual report of consequences (halted imports) without explicit framing cues.
Reports a quote comparing geographic spread factually; 'certainly' is mild intensifier on certainty.
A neutral question about action.
Factual report of expert opinion on contributing factor; 'spreading' is neutral.
Factual report of contributing factor without explicit framing cues.
A neutral question about culling scale.
Factual list of symptoms; descriptive terms like 'paralysis' are not added vivid framing.
Factual report of detection and assessment of potential risk ('likely threat' is neutral assessment).
Factual report of a finding; HPAI is a technical term.
Factual report of a confirmation; 'highly pathogenic' is a technical term.
Factual report of an article update/correction.
Factual list of case types and locations.
Contains explicit reassuring language ('confident in our producers preparedness and ability'). Handled by Q5.
Factual report of how the virus is spread.
Factual report of an action taken (culling).
Factual report of confirmations; 'hit with bird flu' is neutral phrasing.
Factual report of a confirmation; 'hit with avian flu' is neutral phrasing.
'new fear is driven by' is a psychological verb phrase, neutral per context guard unless amplified.
Factual report of events and actions; 'highly pathogenic' is a technical term.
Factual report of geographic scope; 'dealing with' is a neutral verb.
Factual report of status of testing.
Factual report of events ('had to be culled' reports consequence/action).
Factual report of historical and geographic spread; 'circulating' is neutral.
Factual report about the strain; 'circulating' is neutral.
Factual report of a detection.
Factual report of consequences (banning/limiting imports).
Factual report of consequences (limiting purchases).
Factual report of consequences (restrictions, blocking).
Factual report of locations and types of latest cases.
Factual report of historical events; 'large outbreaks' is descriptive scale.
Factual report of belief about spread and test results; 'spreading' is neutral.
Factual report of detection and culling.
